svg.text: Our Qualitative Advantage: The Constraint-Aware Scorecard

text.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:21.3333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;line-height:1.4;fill:#404040

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:21.33333333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: SOTA benchmarks like BEHAVIOR-1K often use

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:21.33333333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

-inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:21.33333333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: They are "blind" to how a task was performed.

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:21.33333333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: They cannot measure critical path-based constraints

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:21.33333333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: like safety, smoothness, or orientation (e.g., spilling

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:21.33333333px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: a glass but delivering the last 10% of water).²
We will implement a unified evaluation module that
augments binary TSR with critical path-based metrics
from SOTA research to measure execution quality.³

svg.text: Track RMS JerkAction Acceleration Metric (A-AI) to penalize unsafe, jerky motions.⁴
Track Path Orientation Violation (POV) to measure spillage by tracking if an object is kept upright.⁵
Track Energy Utilization Efficiency ($f_U$), a true physics-based metric, not just path length.⁶

text.tspan: Sources: ¹[arXiv:2403.09227] BEHAVIOR-1K (2024). | ²[arXiv:2405.16510] Planning with Multi-Constraints... (2024). | ³[arXiv:2507.17049] Evaluating Uncertainty and Quality... (2025). | ⁴[openreview.net/pdf?id=OXQSa9CjR7] STABLE-FAST (2025). |
⁵[arXiv:2409.01652] ReKep (2024). | ⁶[arXiv:2508.06295] Evaluating Robot Program Performance... (2025).
